import React from "react"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => { return (

About Velavan Super Stores

Providing quality products at unbeatable prices since 1998.

Our Journey

Velava Super Stores started as a small grocery shop in Coimbatore and has now grown into one of the most trusted supermarkets in Tamil Nadu. Our commitment to **quality, affordability, and customer satisfaction** has made us a household name.

Our Mission

To provide fresh, high-quality products at the best prices while ensuring an excellent shopping experience for our customers.

Our Values

  • ✅ Customer Satisfaction First
  • ✅ High-Quality Products
  • ✅ Competitive Pricing
  • ✅ Ethical Business Practices

Meet Our Team

Ramesh Kumar

Founder & CEO

Divya Sharma

Operations Manager

); }; export default About;
